SEARCH
Module com.example.snakegame
Package snakegame.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
snakegame.model.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Class coordinating the game mechanism between different objects in the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkCollisions()
    Set game's field 'running' to false if the first unit of snake collides with obstacles, its body or screen border, which stops the game; true otherwise, which continues the game
    void
    checkFruit()
    Increase the size of the snake and current game score by 1 , relocate the fruit and execute the function according to the selected game mode if the first unit of the snake has the same coordinates with the fruit
    void
    checkFruitOnObstacle()
    Relocate the fruit position if its coordinates is the same with any obstacle from the list of obstacles
    void
    drawGameOverText(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
    Draw game over text
    void

    • checkFruit

      public void checkFruit()
      Increase the size of the snake and current game score by 1 , relocate the fruit and execute the function according to the selected game mode if the first unit of the snake has the same coordinates with the fruit

      public void checkFruitOnObstacle()
      Relocate the fruit position if its coordinates is the same with any obstacle from the list of obstacles

    • lizardObstacle

      public void lizardObstacle()
      Adds a number of new obstacles into the list of obstacles, with their coordinates identical to the number of unit of snake counting from back

    • removeObstacle

      public void removeObstacle()
      Remove the fourth element from the list of obstacles if the total amount of obstacles is more than 3

    • checkCollisions

      public void checkCollisions()
      Set game's field 'running' to false if the first unit of snake collides with obstacles, its body or screen border, which stops the game; true otherwise, which continues the game
